connectionError: Haysashada khaladaadka server-ka, isku day mar kale!

loginStep0Explanation: Adigoo gelaya emailkaaga marka hore isla halkaas sanduuqa yar!
loginStep1Explanation: Hadda geli eraygaaga sirta ah si aad u sii wadato ku sheekeysiga uChat.
wrongPassword: Furaha sirta ah ee khaldan Fadlan isku day mar kale!

step0Subtitle: Waxaad u isticmaali doontaa tan si aad u soo gasho
step1Subtitle: Tani waa sida ay kuwa kale kuu arki doonaan (3-30 xaraf)
signupStep0Explanation: Soo dhawoow! Aan ku bilowno gelaya ciwaanka iimaylkaaga AMA waxaad iska diiwaan gelin kartaa Google si aad u hesho deg deg ah.
signupStep1Explanation: Dooro sida aad rabto in lagugu ogaado uChat. Kani waa magacaaga bandhiga ee ay kuwa kale arki doonaan. Waxay la mid tahay naanays!
signupStep2Explanation: Gacantaadu waa sida aqoonsigaaga oo kale - gabi ahaanba adiga ayay gaar kuu tahay waxayna caawisaa dadka kale inay ku helaan. Qofna ma koobi karo gacantaada!
signupStep3Explanation: Samee furaha sirta ah ee adag si aad akoonkaaga u ilaaliso, fadlan ka dhig mid amaan ah si dhab ah! ðŸ¥º

passwordNoNumber: Furaha waa in uu ka kooban yahay ugu yaraan hal lambar
